name: InstanceProfile
description: Creates an AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) Instance Profile that can be used with IAM Roles for EC2 Instances.

properties.name: Path
properties.description: The path associated with this IAM instance profile. For information about IAM paths, see Friendly Names and Paths in the AWS Identity and Access Management User Guide.

properties.name: Roles
properties.description: The roles associated with this IAM instance profile.

attributes.name: Arn
attributes.description: Returns the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the instance profile. For example:{"Fn::GetAtt" : ["MyProfile", "Arn"] }This will return a value such as “arn:aws:iam::1234567890:instance-profile/MyProfile-ASDNSDLKJ”.
